New team is looking for a Senior Frontend Vue.js Developer (probable Team Lead position in case you have ambitions and good English).

Required Qualifications:
- 3+ years of experience using JavaScript, CSS in business environment
- Proficient knowledge of web application architecture
- Strong problem solver who has a passion for troubleshooting and effective communication

The ideal candidate also has:
- is available 40+ hours a week
- is a Vue.js expert
- is a Javascript expert and problem solving ninja
- writes clean, simple code, with modular, reusable components
- can work with at least several hours overlap with Pacific time zone so we can communicate daily and work together (ideally, 10 am - 7 pm PST, but if not, as many hours as possible)
- excellent time-management and organization skills
- loves a challenge and wants to help build something truly amazing

The below would be ideal, but not necessary:
- able to code responsive HTML/CSS that looks professional at all screen sizes (not a designer, just someone able to add padding, margins, stack columns at phone width, etc. to make HTML look nice)
- familiar with the Quasar component/CSS library (experience nice but not necessary)
